name: WebGLRenderingContext.deleteTexture
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.deleteTexture() method of the WebGL API deletes a given WebGLTexture object. This method has no effect if the texture has already been deleted.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'deleteTexture' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glDeleteTextures' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
